headline.main: LONG PREPARATION MADE FOR ATTACK; Vast Reserves of Men, Materiel Assembled in South Pacific Before Offensive RABAUL IS NEXT BIG GOAL Eight Air Bases Must Be Taken Before Amphibious Push at Key to Japanese Arc

lead_paragraph: NOUMEA, New Caledonia, July 2 -- Fifteen months ago I was chased out of the Far East by the Japanese. Today I am on my way back, traveling with American forces in the South Pacific.
snippet: NOUMEA, New Caledonia, July 2 -- Fifteen months ago I was chased out of the Far East by the Japanese. Today I am on my way back, traveling with American forces in the South Pacific....

byline.original: By HENRY KEYSLondon Daily Express War Correspondent
